text: Maurice David Landau OBE (22 June 1947 in England â€“ 27 January 2015) was a British-Israeli journalist and newspaper editor. Landau was editor-in-chief of the Israeli newspaper Haaretz from 2004 to 2008. He was the founder and editor-in-chief of the paper's English edition from 1997 to 2004. After leaving Haaretz Landau became the Israel correspondent for The Economist. ==References== Category:1947 births Category:2015 deaths Category:British Jews Category:Israeli journalists Category:Naturalized citizens of Israel Category:Writers from London Category:Editors
title: David Landau (journalist)
